reviews.content: Good experience overall. The wait staff were working very hard and did a great job keeping up with the coals and food orders. For 299k/pp it's a good deal but on the dearer side of buffet dining in Hanoi.
Friendly staff and value for money buffet! Staff will assist to cook the meat.

name: Maru Korean food Dessert
intro: Serves dine-in, Offers takeout, Has no-contact delivery
policy: Kh√°ch h√†ng vui l√≤ng li√™n h·ªá 84 852 508 886 ƒë·ªÉ bi·∫øt th√™m chi ti·∫øt v·ªÅ ch√≠nh s√°ch c·ªßa Maru Korean food Dessert.

reviews.content: I can honestly say that this is one of the best korean food restaurants. Buuut... I recommend you to come here and instead of eating kimbab and chicken try their combo menus(traditional korean food), cause it  definitely worth trying! I was ‚Ä¶

I am back to my country ! Yet i truly miss this taste so bad . If i had a chance to go to Hanoi again, i will definitely go for Maru. What i love most about here is staffs. Even if they find it hard to communicate with me in English, yet they have tried their best. Always wear a smile on their face. ü•∞ ‚Ä¶

Nice view, good food, service is fine at first, then after the meal, when I ordered free ice-cream (which is included in the total bill), the employee forgot us, and even served the next table and didn't come to ask whether we needed something or not.

Very cute small restaurant, aesthetic food and tasty also ! Perfect for couple dates ! I recommend to get couple sets very good value and lot of sides love it. Dont understand the bad reviews just try it see it for yourself!
Came here for the second time. The space was super cute with the sweet tone (light pink, white and pearl green). People who come here mostly are teens and uni students. ‚Ä¶

The food was edible, however the service and the waiter‚Äôs attitude are so bad, they look like they‚Äôre so mad at us for coming. As long as I walked in, I asked about the reservation, and the waiter gave us like side eyes, and they replied us ‚Ä¶
Slow place. I waited for almost 30 minutes for my takeaway order, and they even gave me the wrong order, I was lucky because I didn‚Äôt go too far and I came back.
Korean food is very good! Awesome!
Nice places, good service. The foods are pretty good and got fair prices.
Very good food also good vibe! Would come back again

name: East Sea Seafood Restaurant
intro: Serves dine-in, Has drive-through, Has no-contact delivery
policy: Kh√°ch h√†ng vui l√≤ng li√™n h·ªá 84 898 080 794 ƒë·ªÉ bi·∫øt th√™m chi ti·∫øt v·ªÅ ch√≠nh s√°ch c·ªßa East Sea Seafood Restaurant.

reviews.content: This is the place to get legit seafood. They have a huge variety of almost everything you can imagine. We were there when the Typhoon flooded the city so no one was there. The menu is huge also...Vietnamese style is plain and simple but you ‚Ä¶

Its probably a tourist trap.... but sometimes too much pho or bun cha is also tiring. We had fresh seafood.. some hits and some misses. The steam grouper is the best (and most expensive at $1.8M) but the cheesy prawns are inedible. Our most expensive meal in Hanoi
Food Quality : 4/5 Service : 4/5 Value for money : 3 5/5 Ambience : 3/5

They have a decent range of  live seafood but i will expect price to be lower(maybe 20 to 30% lower) than what they charge us (based on Hanoi). Place is quite run down and not clean. Food quality is decent. The shop assistant wanted us to give a good review for 2 free drinks, which was kind of a turn off.
Seafood
Fresh and delicious
Delicious cheap seafood. The interior was meh but because of the price, friendly service and food quality, I‚Äôm not going to complain hehe
